languages.text: [Улыбнуться] "Очень галантно с твоей стороны принять огонь на себя, чтобы сберечь меня".
[Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться] "Очень галантно с твоей стороны принять огонь на себя, чтобы сберечь меня".

traits.locale_text: [Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."

[Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."
[Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."
[Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."

languages.text: [Sourire] « C'est très aimable de votre part de vous porter volontaire pour vous faire tirer dessus à ma place. »
languages.original_text: [Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire] « C'est très aimable de votre part de vous porter volontaire pour vous faire tirer dessus à ma place. »

languages.text: [微笑む]「{mf|俺|私}をかばって自ら砲火を浴びるとは、とても勇敢で紳士的だな」
languages.original_text: [Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."

traits.locale_text: [微笑む]「{mf|俺|私}をかばって自ら砲火を浴びるとは、とても勇敢で紳士的だな」

languages.text: [Sonreír] «Es muy galante por su parte atraer todo el fuego para protegerme».
languages.original_text: [Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír] «Es muy galante por su parte atraer todo el fuego para protegerme».

languages.text: [微笑]“为了让我轻松些，你一马当先冲入敌阵，真是太勇敢了。”
languages.original_text: [Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."

traits.locale_text: [微笑]“为了让我轻松些，你一马当先冲入敌阵，真是太勇敢了。”

languages.original_text: [Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."

languages.text: [Lächeln] "Es ist sehr ritterlich von Euch, das Feuer auf Euch zu ziehen, um mich zu retten."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "It is very gallant of you to take the fire upon yourself to spare me."

traits.locale_text: [Lächeln] "Es ist sehr ritterlich von Euch, das Feuer auf Euch zu ziehen, um mich zu retten."
